Acknowledgements
Firstly, I want to express my gratitude to all the pilgrims I met on the Path of Santiago. Each and every one of them has left a mark on me, they are the ones who have made this book possible. I appreciate their testimony, their trust and, in many cases, their friendship. They all continue to accompany me in one form or another every day on my personal journey. I have a very specific memory for the two anonymous pilgrims who arrived at the Obradoiro square in Santiago on the afternoon of September 23, 2014 and, still with their backpacks on, embraced with great emotion in front of the Cathedral. A little later, they sat down on the floor of the square. I was touring Santiago, I happened to be there and, upon seeing them, I made up my mind to make the journey and see if I could feel the same emotion as them.
